title: Ideo
body: My team worked closely with IDEO to develop a product for one of the top academic programs in the country. Purpose Project aims to help students discover their passions and plan for the future.

title: Gates Foundation
body: Our team worked with The Gates Foundation to design, build and launch a web app that provides edtech entrepreneurs with better data to inform their products.

title: Disqus Mobile
body: With engagement on the core commenting product as our baseline, my team optimized it for success in the future based on learnings from existing users. We launched the commenting platform for mobile, and helped pivot the product with Disqus Home.
